705229f-a.title: Brooklyn: Kings Highway - Nostrand Avenue
705229f-a.text:
King's Highway, south side, near Nostrand Ave. This house if standing in 1936, would be in 31st Street, just north of Flatbush Ave.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
705229f-a.folder: Kings Highway & Nostrand Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

705230f-b.title: Brooklyn: Kings Highway - Nostrand Avenue
705230f-b.text:
Kings Highway, south side, east of Nostrand Ave., and on line of Eas. 31st Street, showing the John L. Bergen house built in 1875. (John L. Bergen was born in 1835, married Anna, the daughter of Peter Lott in 1872 and died in 1880). This house was demolished in 1925.
1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
The same, from a different angle.
August 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
The same, from a different angle.
August 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
705230f-b.folder: Kings Highway & Nostrand Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
